results.name: a(1)=1, a(2)=2, a(n+1) = (a(n)+a(n+2))/n or a(n+2) = n*a(n+1)-a(n).
comment: Starting with offset 5 unsigned: (1, 4, 19, 110, 751,...) = eigensequence of triangle A003991. - _Gary W. Adamson_, May 17 2010
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..451
